sentences.sContent: A bank of telephoto lenses homed in on him.
sentences.sContent_eng: A bank of telephoto lenses homed in on him.
sentences.sCn: 一整排的远摄镜头都对准了他。

sentences.sContent: You may use a zoom or telephoto lens on your camera.
sentences.sContent_eng: You may use a zoom or telephoto lens on your camera.
sentences.sCn: 你可以在照相机上安装可变距镜头或摄远镜头。

synos.tran: 传真照片；传真电报；摄远镜头

phrases.pCn: 远距镜头；长焦镜头；望远透镜

remMethod.val: tele(远) ＋ photo(照片) → 从远处传过来的照片 → 传真照片

words.tran: 望远镜的；[眼科] 远视的；套管式伸缩的；眼力好的；有先见之明的
[摄] 远距离照相术；[通信] 传真电报术
[通信] 电传打字机，电传打字电报机
